title: How to Make Egg in a Basket With the Redi, Set, Go

steps.headline: Put your bread into the tray and cut a hole in it.
Brush your bread with olive oil.
Break your egg into the hole.
steps.description: Depending on the size of the hole you created, the egg may fit into it, or sit on top of the bread.

steps.headline: Close the lid and set the timer for seven minutes.

text: Preheat your Redi, Set, Go.  Put your bread into the tray and cut a hole in it.  Brush your bread with olive oil.  Break your egg into the hole. Depending on the size of the hole you created, the egg may fit into it, or sit on top of the bread. Close the lid and set the timer for seven minutes.  Pull it out and enjoy!! !
